description:
Matsudaira is furious when he learns that his daughter Kuriko`s coworkers are making advances on her. He carries out an extreme plan to tear them away from her. Kondo and Okita agree with his plan and help out. But it just spins everything even more extreme and out of control. Upon seeing this, Hijikata offers to get Kuriko`s coworkers to give up on her, but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pudding ni Shouyu Kaketara Uni no Aji ga Surutte Iu Kedo Pudding ni Shouyu Kakete mo Pudding to Shouyu no Aji Shika Shinai
They Say Soy Sauce on Pudding Tastes Like Sea Urchin, but Soy Sauce on Pudding Only Tastes Like Pudding and Soy Sauce
プリンに醤油かけたらウニの味がするって言うけどプリンに醤油かけてもプリンと醤油の味しかしない
